Fits great, very comfortable, will buy more for sure.

I used these on my plane trips (really just the pants). They did not appear as sleep pants and were very comfortable. They did not pill or bunch up. They do fade after multiple washings- so use care if you want to use them on multiple trips.
Material is soft and comfortable for lounging and sleeping. Fit is as expected.
Very cute set. Comfy except waist is a little tight.

Cute lounge wear pajama set, looks the same as pictured (true to color). The material is soft and comfortable and the pants are a good length. They material is thin, not see through, decent quality, but don't expect them to keep you warm in cold weather. I prefer thinner material, especially for sleeping, as I am usually hot, so they're perfect for me! They also didn't change much after washing (no shrinking/pilling thus far), will update over time if need be. I'm 5'8", about 170lb, and bought a large black set.
My fiance received these as a just because gift from me. She loves them. They fit true to size and have held up perfect through several washes. The material is good quality and soft.

评论概述: Elastic too tight and waistband is not expendable
评论详情: I made the mistake of buying these pajamas in two colors because they looked cute and got such great reviews. I had to size up to a medium (5'3" 130-135lbs) because the elastic around the waist and ankles was too tight. Medium was a little more comfortable, but I have to fold the waistband down. It has an adjustable string, but it can only be adjusted to make it smaller and not to expand the waistband bigger. My weight tends to fluctuate 5lbs and it is still too tight even when I'm closer to 130lbs rather than 135lbs. Also, the material is pilling on both top and bottoms, and I've only had these pajamas for about 60 days. I regret buying these pajamas and don't recommend them.
I AM going to buy more of these pjs!  Super comfy and light and airy but not letting me be cold.
The fit is nice, but the material is very thin. Would not wear for travel for fear of snagging or ripping. Nice around the house or for pj’s.
Nice looming pair of PJ’S!

I really like these. I bought them to be used as pajamas. The fabric was not quite as soft as I expected, but still comfortable. I can see why some may comment on the shoulders binding a little, but it is not a big issue for me.
Material was nice and the fit was true to size. I liked it, just not enough to keep it. 5’4” 124lb 26” waist, 32C/34B and small fit great.

It is comfortable material and it is accurate that the sleeves run a little tight. I ordered a size up because of the review. The bottoms were then a little big, but they have a drawstring. The color is a little lighter blue than pictured. I will be keeping them.
wifey very happy. WTS Dallas sucks. Go Chiefs.

The pants fit really well and are very comfortable. Perfect for summer. The pockets are deeper than I expected too which is great and my phone doesn’t fall out of them. The waist band has the perfect amount of elasticity and the strings are thick and stay tied but aren’t bulky if you just leave them hanging.  The shirt could be better though. It’s smaller than expected and doesn’t seem to match the quality of the pants. It’s thin and shows everything. I’m not sure if it’s because of my larger chest but the shirt is definitely snug. The sleeves don’t stretch out very much either. I’ll likely wear the pants with a different top or add a hoodie when wearing the top.  The color is nice though and it washes well. I didn’t put either in the dryer and just hung them up to dry. They dried quickly.
Exactly what I wanted. I got compliments on it too!

Finally a pair of pajamas that fit. Probably not your cup of tea if you don't like tight ankle and waist elastic, but I love it. I was so sick of ordering smalls and my pants still falling down. Fabric is very soft, color is great, didn't shrink in washer or dryer. Thick elastic that doesn't twist in waistband or ankles.  My new favorite pajamas and I don't get over heated in these. Probably not the warmest for winter though, but I am okay with that.
Very pleasantly surprised at the perfect fit and very comfortable pj's! These are super cute, even my husband said so! I bought the medium size and I'm 5'3" and 140 lbs.

评论概述: So soft and comfy, great fit!
评论详情: I work from home and was looking for outfits to wear that would be comfortable yet not make me look like a slob. This two-piece set is very cute and stylish; I can wear it out if I need to run to the store, but the best thing about it is the fabric is so soft against your skin. It's like you're wearing pajamas.  I ordered another set for myself and sent one to my sister. Would make a great gift... or buy something for yourself and treat yourself! You deserve it!  The fit is perfect, I ordered an extra large and I am a size 14/16, the length is perfect and it's not too tight but also not too baggy. The elastic at the ankles is not too tight nor is it at the waist. I can't stress enough how comfortable this set is. You will love it!
